1: <pb/>Yajxi'tzuntl tzaj tma'n Qman Dyos te Noe: Kutokxa toju' b'ark kyuk'i'lju' toj tjaya, qu'n naq o'kxta nanq'ina kse'nxju' wajb'ile' kyxol kykyaqilju' xjal toju' tq'ijlalil ja'lo.
2: Kxol kykyaqilju' txkup jsoq'qe' iq'inkxa wuq muj, jun tman ex jun ttxu. Atzu'n kxolju' mya jsoq'qe' naq o'kx jun tman ex jun ttxu iq'inkxa.
3: Ex ikx iq'inkxa wuq muj ti'j junjun tyajajil pich', tu'ntzun tkyej kletju' kyyajajil toj tkyaqil twitz tx'otx'.
4: Qu'n tzul jb'al wu'ne' toj wuq q'ijtel, kab'naq (40) q'ij ex kab'naq (40) qonik'an ktenb'il. Â¡Qu'n kykyaqilju' ati kychwinqlal twitz tx'otx' kub'ni nb'incha'ne' che kb'el nxitu'ne'!, chij te.
5: Atzunte Noe tb'incha kse'nxju' tma Qman Dyos te.
6: <pb/>Tetoq junk'al lajnaq (600) ab'q'i Noe tej tkyej muqliju' tx'otx' tjaq' a' tu'n q'eqjab'.
7: Okxtzun Noetzu' toju' b'ark kyuk'i'lju' tk'wal, exju' t-xu'jil exqe' tlib', tu'n kyklet teju' ninq'eqjab'.
8: Ikqe'xju' txkup jsoq'qe' exqe' mya jsoq'qe', jni'qe'xju' nche lipan, exqe'ju' naq inche qititinje twitz tx'otx'.
9: E'b'jo'kx tuk'i'l Noe toju' b'ark kakab' kyb'aj, jun tman ex jun ttxu kse'nxju' tchaq' Qman Dyos te.
10: <pb/>Tetzunj tjapunju' wuq q'ij tzajtzun q'eqjab'tzu', o'kx taq' jawil chmet a' twitz tx'otx'.
11: Tojtzunju' twuqlajoji'n q'ij teju' tkab' xjaw, tetoq junk'al lajnaq (600) ab'q'i Noe. Atzun q'iju' eb'jatz laqj t-xiklil a' toj tx'otx' ju' tzajniqe' ti'ju' ninnjab', ex nim jb'al tzaj twitz kya'j.
12: Kab'naq q'ij (40) ex kab'naq (40) qonik'an kub' jb'al twitz tx'otx'.
13: Axtzun q'iju' okx Noe toju' b'ark kyuk'i'lju tk'wal aye' Sem, Kam, ex Japet, exju' t-xu'jil kyuk'i'lju' oxe' tlib'.
14: Ex eb'jo'kx tkyaqil kyyajajil txkup aluma'nqe' ex tojk'ul txkup, e'txkup inche qititinje twitz tx'otx' exqe' pich'.
15: Kykyaqilju' txkup lu eb'jo'kx tuk'i'l Noe kakab'chaq kyb'aj toju' b'ark.
16: Junjun tman ex junjun ttxu ti'j tkyaqil kyyajajil, kse'nxju' tma Qman Dyos te Noe. Kyb'jo'kxlenxi'tzun kykyaqil, aku'te Qman Dyos kyej jpunte ttziju' b'ark.
17: <pb/>Kab'naq (40) q'ij tenju' q'eqjab' lu. Tetzunj tchmetju' a', jaw tanananju' b'ark tu'n.
18: Ljo'ntoq tch'iyxi'xtlju' a', atzunju' b'ark intoq tanananje tib'aj.
19: Jaw ch'iyxi'xju' a' expe' majx eb'ajkyaj muqliju' witz nimaqxi'x kywe' tjaq';
20: kyb'aj kyejlenxi'tzun muqliju' nimaq witz, jax ch'iy wuq metrtlju' a' kyib'ajxi'.
21: Ikytzun eb'aja' kykyaqilju' xjal toj tkyaqil twitz tx'otx', ex tkyaqil pich', e'txkup aluma'nqe', e'tojk'ul txkup exqe' nche qititinje twitz tx'otx'.
22: Kykyaqilju' ati kychwinqlal twitz tx'otx' ex nche xewti eb'aj kyim.
23: Noq o'kxte Noe kyuk'i'lju' eb'jo'kx tuk'i'l toj b'ark e'kyaj anq'in; kykyaqiltzunju' txqantel majx eb'aj: e'xjal, e'txkup aluma'nqe', e'pich' nche lipan twitz kya'j, exqe' txkup nche qititinje twitz tx'otx'.
24: Jwe' xjaw tenju' a' twitz tx'otx'.
